title: The Perfect moment
creator_credit: MacGillivray Freeman Films and Greg MacGillivray
brief_description: Focuses on various skilled athletes as they attain instances of total physical and mental control, when a combination of technique, opportunity, training, drive and environmental conditions product moments of perfection. With Jan-Michael Vincent and narrated by Orson Welles.
